hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\blue{4+1}&\blue{=6}\\
\blue{5}&\blue{=6}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $5$ is not the same as $6$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{2+4}&\pink{=5}\\
\pink{6}&\pink{=5}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $6$ is not the same as $5$.

$\begin{align}
\purple{5+0}&\purple{=5}\\
\purple{5}&\purple{=5}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $5$ is the same as $5$.
